body: Now that avicus is over for me, I'm just wondering, how can I see all my friends on avicus in Minecraft anymore? Any ideas?
body_tagged: Now that avicus is over for me, I'm just wondering, how can I see all my friends on avicus in Minecraft anymore? Any ideas?
title: How can I see you guys again?

replies.body: Send an appeal?
replies.body_tagged: Send an appeal?

replies.body: I don't want this to start over again, I already tried, and I got denied (hehe Dr.Suess right there). That's off topic. Please read the title and description please.
replies.body_tagged: I don't want this to start over again, I already tried, and I got denied (hehe Dr.Suess right there). That's off topic. Please read the title and description please.

replies.body: play on a different server... play different games... talk on skype... there are plenty of ways
replies.body_tagged: play on a different server... play different games... talk on skype... there are plenty of ways

replies.body: WHY U BANNED?
replies.body_tagged: WHY U BANNED?

replies.body: 1. I don't have Skype. 2. I can't give other servers here without being forum banned for advertising. Stop asking why I'm banned. The staff are gonna say I made this for attention again. I just want to know how I can play with my friends again.
replies.body_tagged: 1. I don't have Skype. 2. I can't give other servers here without being forum banned for advertising. Stop asking why I'm banned. The staff are gonna say I made this for attention again. I just want to know how I can play with my friends again.

replies.body:
1. easy way to fix = make an account
2. You can't get banned for advertising... if you get unbanned and want 2 play on another server tell your friends the name of the server (not ip) and tell them to search ip...
replies.body_tagged:
1. easy way to fix = make an account
2. You can't get banned for advertising... if you get unbanned and want 2 play on another server tell your friends the name of the server (not ip) and tell them to search ip...

replies.body: My parents won't let me get Skype....

replies.body: Email, skype? MC Forums, they have a msging system.

replies.body: No email no skype
replies.body_tagged: No email no skype

replies.body: Unless you are willing to make a Skype or Email than you can't. You could use Steam Chat :P
replies.body_tagged: Unless you are willing to make a Skype or Email than you can't. You could use Steam Chat :P

replies.body: Last time I checked having lots of infractions wasn't against the rules.

replies.body: Define steam chat
replies.body_tagged: Define steam chat

replies.body:
Personally I think it's possible to get unbanned.

Join the forums community a bit, be nice, and get a good forum rep.

Then, rewrite your appeal well and hope to be unbanned.
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body: Messaging people on steam ..

replies.body: Hack Howsie, its been a pretty popular choice

replies.body: And this isn't asking how to get unbanned, it's how to meet up with all my friends again.
replies.body_tagged: And this isn't asking how to get unbanned, it's how to meet up with all my friends again.

replies.body: You need to make a Skype then, add your friends from Avicus and start chatting.

replies.body:
Nolan is saying if you have a great attitude, help out on the forums, and be generally a nice person you can resubmit an appeal with a greater chance of being accepted.

Just because you were denied once doesn't mean you can never play again.
